extends Column

      • scrollTo

        public void scrollTo(UiElement element,
                     boolean immediate)
        Moves the scroll thumb until the UiElement is visible
        Parameters:
        element - The UiElement to scroll to
        immediate - True if the ScrollBox should "jump" to the element. False if the scrolling should be smooth.

      • scrollToTop

        public void scrollToTop(boolean immediate)
        Scrolls to the first element in the ScrollBox
        Parameters:
        immediate - True if the ScrollBox should "jump" to the element. False if the scrolling should be smooth.

      • getScrollFactor

        public float getScrollFactor()
        Returns how much this ScrollBox scrolls when the up/down buttons are clicked (expressed as a % between 0.0 and 1.0)
        Returns:
        DEFAULT_SCROLL_FACTOR by default
